the demon slayer mugen train movie is amazing. the premise of the villain drowning you in a dream so good that you never wanna wake up? genius. demonstrating a character’s willpower by having him kill himself to wake up? also genius. the whole thing is just chef’s kiss.

RT @JaketheVGAfella: With the exception of the first episode, the Mugen Train arc of Demon Slayer is pretty much all just recycled footage…

With the exception of the first episode, the Mugen Train arc of Demon Slayer is pretty much all just recycled footage from the movie, only without the opening scene of Kagaya. They really could've just made the first episode a Standalone OVA and let the movie be the default arc.
